00008 extern double umask[NXMEM][NYMEM];   /* _mask are 1 over ocean and 0  */
00009 extern double vmask[NXMEM][NYMEM];   /* over land on the u & v grids. */
00010 
00011 extern double D[NXMEM][NYMEM];

00013 void initializemasks() {
00014 
00015   int i,j;
00016   double Dmin;
00017 
00018   Dmin = MINIMUM_DEPTH;  /* value set in init.h */
00019   Dmin = (Dmin > 2.0*EPSILON) ? Dmin : 2.0*EPSILON;

00021

00033     }
